熏.definition: to smoke; to fumigate; to assail the nostrils; to perfume

熏染.definition: to exert a gradual influence; to nurture; a corrupting influence

熏烤.definition: to smoke; to cure over a wood fire

熏製.definition: to smoke; to cure over a fire

熏陶成性.definition: (idiom) nurture makes second nature; good habits come by long assimilation
